forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies this morning will become overcast during the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 22C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine early followed by cloudy skies this afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 72F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers after midnight. Low 8C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers overnight. Low 46F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Thunder possible. High 14C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Thunder possible. High 57F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low near 5C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 41F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 44F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 58F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 8C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 47F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 46F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
